headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Quiet Times in Freemode
content:
If you prefer the quiet life, you can choose to opt out of specific Events or Activities by customising your Freemode experience. Access the Hide Options from the Interaction Menu and choose to hide or show each option.

Hiding an Event or Activity will suppress the notifications for uninterrupted play. If you later feel you are missing out on the fun you can re-enable them whenever you want.
